content.label: I BOUT THIS TRASH, GOOD ART BUT I DID THE  INSTRUCTIONS THEN IT YEA BYE

I really like the game—the music, aesthetic, characters and gameplay were all very charming. At one point, a glitch in the game caused a crucial item to not be given to me and I wandered around for a good chunk of time clueless as what I was supposed to do. I consulted a guide and a robot woman was supposed to throw a radio out of a window that I need in order to continue. Said radio is still sitting in her window, however. What a waste of time. :|
Great graphics, fun to play, no bugs on my IPhone 7, puzzles a challenge at times, but if you get stuck you just open the book & step by step instructions are inside! Thx devs great game!

Years ago when i was little I started playing this game but I accidentally deleted it and i didn’t remember the name of it, i tried and tried to find it and I finally did! This game is absolutely amazing, i would give it 100000000 stars if i could! The graphics are amazing, the music is calming and nice. I love the story line. Im 17 and it still had me puzzled, its not just a little kid game! I loved the imagery in this game, it is so beautiful. It is worth every penny to play. It even has a wonderful storyline! It kept me hooked and I just loved it so much. Thankyou so much for making this game!

The game itself Is great looking and story Is ok in its own way,  I couldn’t find any type of flow to how to solve the levels and 98% of the time your hitting the clue button to try and figure out what your supposed to do and that gets you to a point of no satisfaction of competition, and the constant robot shaking his head at every move you try gets so bad you end up just walking away frustrated

title.label: Played years ago and one of my favorites.

content.label: So, I hope to see more from this dev!
I thought the art was cool and took a gamble. Can I have my money back please? I really don’t like the gameplay or concept itself.
Great game. Hard but not impossibly so. Got stuck a few times but after taking a break and coming back with fresh eyes, able to figure things out. Hope the robot on the ledge by the stairs is ok.

I really enjoyed the puzzles and environments. Fantastic art and fun music. Finally finished it tonight after not playing for a bit and I was really getting into it when I solved the last puzzle. When’s the next one coming out?

Great idea and game except I get the inventory items to go where they are to be used. I have time, know where and how to use, but can’t get them to go there. For instance, the key won’t go into the slot:  The arrow says it goes there, it has been positioned all around it at various times, but it flies back up to inventory. Only one example, but that type of thing has happened repeatedly in this game. Too frustrating to keep it up. Would be nice to just go when the solution has been found. After several days, just deleted in the thing. Too bad.

title.label: Best game on App Store in my opinion

content.label: This is my most favorite game in the App Store! I’ve played it over and over. I have it on my iPhone and iPad and it runs great, no glitches or bugs. It’s a beautiful game with a good story line. I can’t wait to see what other games you all come out with
Love the game.  Playing on an ipad pro 12.9 and no glitches until the tower room.  No matter how many times I try, I can't get any sound on the radio or the keys outside.
The Space Invaders game in the arcade quits too easily when your finger missed the control buttons. Very, very annoying. Fix it please.

The game has some bugs that are likely to result in the end of the game you are playing, although the smooth, detailed graphics in themselves make it an enjoyable game.  If you are satisfied only with the reputation of completing it, you will probably not want to get this game until it has been tweaked on a number of the levels.  If you play it for the enjoyment of the creativity of the graphics and the challenge of each complex part, then you are likely to love the ride.  Just be warned of likely speed bumps until later versions are released.

The visuals are gorgeous and the storyline is very unique. I loved every aspect of the walkthrough and the mini games aswell. The revealer game is great for when u absolutely get stuck or dont know how to use a piece u have found. I really loved every aspect of the game, music included but the saddest part about it is concluding it :( i wouldnt say it is to short of a game but i would highly enjoy more play or a second edition as the story continues. All in all i would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a true puzzler game. My first play thru even with a few revealers used to proceed it took me 8hrs of straight play to accomplish the ending! Hav fun everyone :)

This game has sat on my phone since release and every few months I come back and complete it again. The art and sound offer such a nostalgic element for me that every time I revisit it I get that warm fuzzy feeling that only a few games can provide. I had a temporary problem where the save data would not be correct but the developer addressed that very quickly once I brought it up.
They don’t work well. You’ll just be tapping the screen all night hoping something happens.
I’ve played on iPad and Apple TV 4K. Both have wonderful UIs. The puzzles are really hard sometimes, but that’s part of the fun!

This game is amazing, addicting, and extremely fun! I love puzzle games, and I think this is the perfect fit for me! The art is also top notch, and abstract in a way. Some of the puzzles were hard, but I always love myself a challenge. If you like puzzle games, buy this, or you’re missing out! (I’ve completed the game twice now, and I am about to do it a third time!)
The robot from the oil bar is rigged it is a really fun game but the robot just bugs me  pls fix this also keep up the good work!
You have to hit the screen in exactly the same spot that is needed, if you are off slightly you will miss your timing and have to do it all over again. Annoying

This game worked perfectly on my iPad two years ago and was beautiful and a ton of fun. I just tried to play it again now and it is very buggy on the same iPad. The game will not save and every time I open it I cannot resume, but it starts at the bridge with the traffic cone hat. I load scenes, and when I reenter the game, all of the scenes are gone and again I have to start at the bridge.I got a quick response from the team, but no help since that first response. I have deleted and downloaded it again. We’ll see if it improves the situation at all.

There is a bug in stage 4 and I got stuck here right now... after clicking the red button on the machine, I should be able to open the control panel on the right side, but when I do that I can’t see the control panel coming out. Hope this can be fixed...same problem on iPadpro and iPhone8.

Do not buy this game on the iPhone X! There is a screen glitch that near the end of the game that prevents you from completing a puzzle due to the screen zooming in and not allowing you to use an item. Game would be 5 stars without this glitch.
Should have gotten 10 stars.  Can’t wait for the fourth game.
You want immersive? You got it. I’ve been following this company for several years now due to their beautifully unique and artistic games. Brilliant and clever.

title.label: A game to hold its value for forever

content.label: This is by far my favorite iOS game. The artwork shows very much how well this game was designed. Everything from the way to get help for a puzzle to how every single part of the area has a purpose to completing the main quest. I have played this game through til the end at least 5 times now and still absolutely love it. The artwork is astounding, the puzzles go from easy to extremely difficult and range from every kind of puzzle imaginable. I absolutely adore this game.
Hard as hell at times...BUT GREAT Game!!!

I love everything, but there are a few minor things that need to be fixed. The whole app would freeze and I won’t be able to move until I completely close out of the app. I’ve had to restart the whole game once, because the app just didn’t want to work at that level. Then once I redid everything and passed that level it does the same thing after two levels above the one I’ve had to restart.I love the app. Worth paying for, but the small minor bugs and stuff make me wanna scream and break my phone.

I played this game about 2 years ago and enjoyed it, no problems. Now when I try to save the game into empty slots, I’ll start up the game later only to have to start this one particular level OVER and OVER again. I save correctly into one or two slots (two just to make sure), quit the game normally (not just swiping away) and resume the last game (even loading from a previous slot). Nothing works. I feel sorry for anyone who actually wants to play this game but not all in one sitting.

I loved the game. I loved that it was not easy, it made me think. Each puzzle is unique and I caught myself going in, thinking “this chapter will be easy” and it wasn’t. I loved it. I also loved playing space invaders (I must say I lost a few times). The graphics, the music, the sound effects... Great story too. Beautiful!
Does not work on iphone. Needs mouse. I will try to get my money back.

Game is so far interesting but like most of the others no Iphone X screen suport ?? Please fix this and for all others do not download if you have an X not worth the money until screen issues are fixed.

i got this adventure game for the graphics, haven’t experienced any bugs, but i find the game play very challenging.  In order to get hints you must play a simple arcade game (i’m terrible at these).   In spite of the difficulty level, its my favorite game.
I wish there was a part 2!!!!!

I loved this game. The design is just breathtaking. It’s as if you are inside the game experiencing everything that your cute little robot friend is! Together you’ll journey into a world of puzzles in an effort to save the girl you love. A love story, puzzling missions, and brilliant story line. This game will offer hours of thrilling game play!

title.label: Looks great, but some real problems

content.label: On the plus side of the ledger, I absolutely loved this game's graphics and found the storyline cute and engaging. Machinarium is, however, plagued by some significant problems. Game play is occasionally hampered by poor touch screen control — the pleasure derived by puzzle games lies in their ability to stimulate the mind; they shouldn’t rely on the user tapping exactly the right pixel at exactly the right millisecond, as too frequently happens in this game. More critically, gameplay can be completely blocked by any of various bugs. My own progress came to a shrieking halt about three-quarters of the way through (not an inconsiderable investment of my time) after encountering one such documented bug.

I’ve heard a lot good reviews before I downloaded it to my iPad. Then I found that maybe the game itself has a unique style, but the experience of playing it is terrible. And I’m sure it’s not my device’s problem since mine is the new iPad Pro and I’ve played many other games while none of them have any issue.
1. The music and sound effects disappeared for many times and restart the game won’t even fix it
2. The whole screen got stuck when I tried to solve a puzzle and went back to normal once I stopped trying. So I have to give up and delete this game because I couldn’t move forward anymore.
3. The controls are very difficult. If you want to use some of the equipments you’ve obtained, you have to place them PRECISELY where they belong and sometimes even try several times for it to work.
I still think this is a good game and I assume it might work better on PC or Mac. But please fix these bugs in this iOS version. Look forward to seeing its update.

Every single game from this animation studio is a masterpiece. 
I just wish there were more games like this,  and available on a variety of systems. They are mostly limited to PC.
Wonderful game.
It’s one of the best iPad games I have ever played!

title.label: Great game until tic tac toe

content.label: I can’t get past the 5 in a row tic tac toe. I tried looking up tutorials but none of them seem to work. I love this game, but that doesn’t mater if I can’t get past this point.

I was able to get to the docks, where you try to get the dog with the suction gun. But there was NO WAY to use the gun. The character refused to use it when I tried to place in its hand.
How are you supposed to use it when the game won’t allow it?
I’ve tried researching an answer to this, but all I’ve found is “place the gun in the robot’s hand”. That’s fine, if you can figure out HOW TO DO IT. This now becomes a complete waste of money, as it’s been deleted.
Interesting story and clever puzzles, although sometimes very challenging (more so than any of The Room games). If you get stumped, you can request a hint or play a retro game for a walkthrough.
One of my favorite puzzling and adventure games!

Which pretentious fool gave this any award. This is crap and there is only one of the impossible things to do on this app. Crap games inside this puzzle game. I'm talking the five in a row. That is impossible to beat. This is a real pain and no workaround for it. Whose idea was it to have that as part of the game. Well you stole $.99 from me plus tax. Wish apple gave refunds. Good game with great artwork but that's not why I got this app.
...It’s not saving my game anymore and it’s super frustrating.

This game looks awesome and the graphics are amazing. 

But for a non gamer looking to start out it’s hard. No intro, nothing to help you learn the game. I wish they helped you with a level or two so you could learn the basics. 

I really want to love the game and play. But if your not a gamer you will never pass the first level and just waste your money.

I like this company’s concepts. BUT, this game is frustrating and not enjoyable because the character will not do what I’m telling it to do. I have used both curser mode and touch mode. The game is not responsive many times and I end up having to repeat steps more times than I should. Takes the fun out of it.
I'd give this more stars if I could. I've played it though three times! Only complaint would be - where is the sequel???? I'd pay $50.

I have played this game three times already and I still haven’t gotten bored although the “Match 5 game” and the first arcade game were challenging and took me multiple days to beat, this game is very fun and it is definitely worth the money

P.S. I bought the pack
